item.title: Clone Bandits Fan Kit
item.author: invalid@example.com (Al[Demiurge])
item.dc:creator: Al[Demiurge]
item.content:encoded:
Love Clone Bandits so much that you want to make a website or perhaps just hang CB-related pictures all over your pad? Perhaps blast surf-rock into the weee hours of the morning? Look no further than the officially-sactioned-and-certified Clone Bandits Fan Site Kit!

We've never done anything like this before, so if you want more stuff, I'll see what I can dig up. Download it here:
http://qix.demiurgestudios.com/~areed/public/CBFanKit.zip. (23 megs)

item.title: Demiurge Studios interview
item.author: invalid@example.com (Aconite)
item.dc:creator: Aconite
item.content:encoded:
As reported on BU, a couple of the guys have been interviewed by HomeLAN Fed...

Apparently we're fanatical.

item.title: The 3 Amigos Community Map Released
item.author: invalid@example.com (cravensmythe)
item.dc:creator: cravensmythe
item.content:encoded:
All I am one of a few amigos bandit mappers who has been working to provide the community with an additional map pack to live alongside demiurges excellent maps.

We have created 3 new maps each with a different style and musical score, all are dripping in clone bandits charm.

The new maps in no particular order are

Mingotrap

This is the smallest map and is lush wasteland junkyard desert, it is full of stunt ramps and has big steaming hoop shaped pipe to jump. Can you find the...

The 3 Amigos Community Map Released

item.title: DS Official Server Down
item.author: invalid@example.com (Jason[Demiurge])
item.dc:creator: Jason[Demiurge]
item.content:encoded:
Sorry about this guys, but due to one of our other machines misbehaving, we've had to re-appropriate the machine that was hosting one of our official Clone Bandits servers. It looks like there are a handful of other servers out there though so I'm sure eveyone will be able to get their fix somewhere

When we have our server back up, I'll make sure someone posts to let the rest of the world know.

item.title: TribeCloWn Server Updated to 1.1
item.author: invalid@example.com (|\|e0_[CloWn])
item.dc:creator: |\|e0_[CloWn]
item.content:encoded:
IP: 213.230.200.200:9999

Updated to 1.1 and running holib's custom map pack....enjoy!

Let me know how the server runs.

---==|\|e0==---

item.title: DS Official Clones Bandits Servers Back
item.author: invalid@example.com (Al[Demiurge])
item.dc:creator: Al[Demiurge]
item.content:encoded:
With our move to the new offices in Cambridge, MA we got our official servers up and running again. Connect, play and let us know what we can do to be better UT server admins!

Server #1: 12.151.131.246
Server #2: 66.219.41.218

Cheers,
Al

item.title: Clone Bandits v1.1 Released!
item.author: invalid@example.com (hottoast)
item.dc:creator: hottoast
item.content:encoded:
Dear Bandits,

It's been a while since we've had a big announcement, but we haven't forgotten about you guys! After much testing, we're proud to present Clone Bandits v1.1, now with 27% more banditry! The big news in this release is the inclusion of two brand new maps, Peril Plateau and Processing Plant! Get ready to brush up on your CB skills, since these maps demand a whole new set of strategies. As always, you can download the new installer...

Clone Bandits v1.1 Released!

item.title: Post your server
item.author: invalid@example.com ([GU]Opcode)
item.dc:creator: [GU]Opcode
item.content:encoded:
We have a 6 player Clone Bandit server at Gamerzunlimited.com the IP is 63.246.168.123:7777/. It's running Excessive Overkill as well.

You must uncheck the 'STANDARD SERVERS ONLY' box in the UT2004 Server Browser : Internet to see other servers listed.

item.title: Make Something Unreal Contest - Finalists!
item.author: invalid@example.com (hottoast)
item.dc:creator: hottoast
item.content:encoded:
Hey Folks,

I'm happy to announce that we've been chosen as a finalist in the 'Best FPS Mod' category for the Make Something Unreal Contest! Thanks go out to all of our beta testers, who helped us make Clone Bandits into a contender. We'll use this thread to keep everyone updated on how we do in the remainder of the contest - cross your fingers for us!

Cheers,
Tom

item.title: Clone Bandits 1.0 released!
item.author: invalid@example.com (hottoast)
item.dc:creator: hottoast
item.content:encoded:
Hey folks,

We officially launched Clone Bandits 1.0 today to the general public. No passwords required, no username. You can download it from a few places right now, click on the link below for a list of mirrors.

http://www.demiurgestudios.com/CloneBandits/download.htm

We hope that you guys enjoy the mod. We've made some slight improvements and changes in this release that we feel enhance the playability of the game a lot. As always, feel free to use these forums to voice...

Clone Bandits 1.0 released!

item.title: Get the Clone Bandits Beta!
item.author: invalid@example.com (hottoast)
item.dc:creator: hottoast
item.content:encoded:
Hey Folks,

I know a bunch of you are excited about Clone Bandits, and trust me - we hear you! We'd like to try to get the early beta of CB into your hands as soon as we can, so we've devised a clever plan: if you sign up for the mailing list on the main Clone Bandits site, then we'll send you a username and password for the download. Good deal, huh?

Go to this page to get to the mailing list signup, it's right on the left side of the page....

Get the Clone Bandits Beta!

item.title: Clone Bandits Beta 2
item.author: invalid@example.com (Al[Demiurge])
item.dc:creator: Al[Demiurge]
item.content:encoded:
Attention Beta Testers:

A new beta has been sent out, check the email submitted to the Clone Bandits site for details.

Enjoy!
-Al

item.title: Demiurge Beta Server Patched
item.author: invalid@example.com (Jason[Demiurge])
item.dc:creator: Jason[Demiurge]
item.content:encoded:
Sorry for the delay, but our beta server has been updated with the the ut2004-winpatch3204.exe patch so those of you who have already installed the patch will be able to connect to our server again. And for those who haven't installed the patch yet, you can download it here:

http://download.beyondunreal.com/fileworks.php/official/ut2004/ut2004-winpatch3204.exe

For instructions on how to connect to the server after downloading the mod, see our "Download" page here:...

Demiurge Beta Server Patched

item.title: Clone Bandits Swag!
item.author: invalid@example.com (hottoast)
item.dc:creator: hottoast
item.content:encoded:
Hey folks,

Have you got too much money? An unnatural desire to garb yourself in videogame related apparel? Lack of shame?

If you answered 'yes' to any of these questions, you'll want to take a good hard look at this link for all sorts of crazy Clone Bandits related merchandise, just waiting to leap into your quivering, capitalist hands.

We make no guarantees as to the quality of...

Clone Bandits Swag!

item.title: Check us out at E3
item.author: invalid@example.com (Al[Demiurge])
item.dc:creator: Al[Demiurge]
item.content:encoded:
If you swing by NVIDIA's booth on Wednesday at 5:00, we'll hand you a login and password to download the beta! Come by and check us out.

Al

item.title: Clone Bandits Announced!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Al[Demiurge])
item.dc:creator: Al[Demiurge]
item.content:encoded:
Check it out! http://www.demiurgestudios.com/CloneBandits

Here's the press release:

DEMIURGE STUDIOS UNVEILS "CLONE BANDITS" MODIFICATION FOR UNREAL
TOURNAMENT 2004 AT ELECTRONIC ENTERTAINMENT EXPO (E3)

PITTSBURGH, PA - May 10, 2004 - Demiurge Studios, Inc. announced its
Unreal Tournament 2004 modification: "Clone Bandits" today. Set in a
highly stylized post-apocalyptic world, Clone Bandits pits two bands of
ruffians against one another in a fight to survive. To...

Clone Bandits Announced!

item.title: Welcome!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Goughl)
item.dc:creator: Goughl
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to the Clone Badits Forum. There's not much to talk about yet, but expect more information on Monday, May 10th.

-Al
